Crime_Name: Procedural Fairness Breach in Refugee Claim
Burden_of_Proof: On applicant to demonstrate procedural unfairness
Credibility_Factor: Claimant's inability to attend due to injury
Legal_Rule: Compliance with procedural fairness, including proper withdrawal of counsel (Section 15) and consideration of claimant explanations (Section 65)
Procedural_Issue: Late withdrawal of counsel without compliance with Section 15, refusal to adjourn hearing
Outcome_on_Merits: Not reached – decision set aside due to procedural defects
Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: Panel failed to ensure fair process by not allowing adjournment and ignoring medical evidence
Applicant_Challenge: Panel's handling of counsel withdrawal and refusal to adjourn
Legal_Rule_Source: Refugee Protection Division Rules, Section 15 and Section 65
Remedy_Requested: Setting aside the decision and ordering a rehearing
Outcome: Decision set aside, case reassigned for rehearing
Legal_Provision: Section 15 and Section 65 of the Refugee Protection Division Rules
Grounds_for_Inadmissibility_or_Allegatio: None – issue was procedural fairness, not substantive inadmissibility
